posts.title: There's a blue light that won’t turn off
posts.body: I’ve burned through three pieces of wood already  by using too much power on the laser cutter. Does anyone have a good guide on power settings to use on wood?
posts.author: Ken M.

replies.body: We’ve checked out the light. The filter needed changing, and we’ve swapped it out with a new one.
replies.author: Beth

replies.body: We’ve checked out the light. The filter needed changing, and we’ve swapped it out with a new one.
